name: The day before Christmas
description:
This game is a puzzle and exploration game. Players have to explore the map and collect materials to craft more items to go to different levels. The principle of this game is based on ideas of the city of “Despina” chapter from the book Invisible cities , so each crafting choice can lead the player to go to a different level.

This game is made by Hao Xu, DATT3300, Lab 01
